basic.blooming: Flowering period March-May, fruiting period September-November
basic.color: Flower color light yellow, fruit color red

maintenance.soil: Soil with rich organic matter and strong abilities of holding water and fertility
maintenance.sunlight: Like half shade, may grow in places with bright scattered light
maintenance.watering: Watering only when soil is dry, water thoroughly
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and diseased branches timely
